        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Why did you send me a virus?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum schickten Sie mir ein Virus?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi m'avez-vous envoyé un virus ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que você me emitiu um vírus?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè mi avete trasmesso un virus?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί μου στείλατε έναν ιό;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué usted me envió un virus?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A primer on viruses, worms, and how to protect yourself on the Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Zündkapsel auf Viren, Endlosschrauben und wie man 
auf dem Internet schützt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une amorce sur des virus, vers, et comment se protéger 
sur l'Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um primer em vírus, sem-fins, e como proteger-se no 
Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un iniettore sui virus, viti senza fine e come proteggersi
sul Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας εγχυτήρας στους ιούς, σκουλήκια, και πώς να 
προστατευθεί στο διαδίκτυο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una cartilla en los virus, gusanos, y cómo protegerse en 
el Internet.</string>
          </description>
